actionCalls.name: Copy_1_of_Leave_Edited_By_Director
actionCalls.label: Copy 1 of Leave Edited By Director

decisions.name: Check_How_Modified_the_Leave_Record
decisions.label: Check How Modified the Leave Record

rules.name: Record_is_Updated
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 6 OR 7 ) AND 5
rules.label: Updated By Director

rules.name: Updated_By_HR
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 8) AND 7
rules.label: Updated By HR

textTemplates.description: This Email body is used when the director himself/herself edits the Leave Record Details
textTemplates.name: Body1_DirectorModifyLeaveRequest
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!$Record.EMS_LM_Contact__r.FirstName} {!$Record.EMS_LM_Contact__r.LastName},


The following details of your leave record are edited by you.


Leave Start Date

Leave End Date

Status

Day

Reason

{!$Record.EMS_LM_Leave_Start_Date__c}

{!$Record.EMS_LM_Leave_End_Date__c}

{!$Record.EMS_LM_Status__c}

{!$Record.EMS_LM_Day__c}

{!$Record.EMS_LM_Reason__c}


Regards,

The Cloud Peritus Team

textTemplates.description: This Template is used when the Leave request is edited by HR
textTemplates.name: Body2_HREditLeaveRecord
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!$Record.EMS_LM_Contact__r.FirstName} {!$Record.EMS_LM_Contact__r.LastName},


The following details of your leave record are edited by the HR team.


Leave Start Date

Leave End Date

Status

Day

Reason

{!$Record.EMS_LM_Leave_Start_Date__c}

{!$Record.EMS_LM_Leave_End_Date__c}

{!$Record.EMS_LM_Status__c}

{!$Record.EMS_LM_Day__c}

{!$Record.EMS_LM_Reason__c}


Regards,

The Cloud Peritus Team

textTemplates.name: Body3_DirectorCancelLeaveRecord
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!$Record.EMS_LM_Contact__r.FirstName} {!$Record.EMS_LM_Contact__r.LastName},


Your {!$Record.EMS_LM_Leave_Type__r.Name}  request has been cancelled by you.

Leave Start Date

Leave End Date

Status

Day

{!$Record.EMS_LM_Leave_Start_Date__c}

{!$Record.EMS_LM_Leave_End_Date__c}

{!$Record.EMS_LM_Status__c}

{!$Record.EMS_LM_Day__c}


Reason: {!$Record.EMS_LM_Reason__c}


Regards,

The Cloud Peritus Team

textTemplates.name: Body4_HRCancelLeaveRecord
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!$Record.EMS_LM_Contact__r.FirstName} {!$Record.EMS_LM_Contact__r.LastName},


Your {!$Record.EMS_LM_Leave_Type__r.Name}  request has been cancelled by HR Team.

Leave Start Date

Leave End Date

Status

Day

{!$Record.EMS_LM_Leave_Start_Date__c}

{!$Record.EMS_LM_Leave_End_Date__c}

{!$Record.EMS_LM_Status__c}

{!$Record.EMS_LM_Day__c}


Reason: {!$Record.EMS_LM_Reason__c}


Regards,

The Cloud Peritus Team

variables.description: stores the value of the Contacts Resource Role Name Value
variables.name: directorRole
